name: SINNERMAN
description:
WHO IS SINNERMAN?

Is he a soul condemned for his sins? Or just a madman with hallucinations? Maybe the victim of a cruel experiment?
To find out, you will have to get his memories back by making your way through scenes taken from the worst nightmares imaginable, which will take you to one of several possible endings.

You can support my Kickstarter here:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/607254314/sinnerman

GAME FEATURES

-Explore a world of nightmares.
-Fight your fears made flesh.
-10 regular enemies,2 mid bosses,2 bosses.
-Find 4 differents weapons,rip souls,die and upgrade your powers.
-Secret zones and items.

CONTROLS
XBox Controller Supported.

Up + Attack - Magic Attack.
Z-attack/Cancel.
X-jump/Select.
C-dash.
Arrow keys-Move.
S-change magic.
P-Pause/Inventory/Leave Shop.
Q-Quit.


Made by @LaFigaraNegra
